name: pleroma
description: Pleroma is a lightweight federated social network built using Elixir and Phoenix. It supports ActivityPub federation, custom themes, chat, and scalable self-hosted deployments.
features: Federated social network: Connect with users across Mastodon, Pleroma, and other ActivityPub platforms.
Lightweight architecture: Built with Elixir for efficient resource usage and scalability on modest hardware.
Custom themes: Personalize the interface with custom CSS themes and color schemes.
Rich media posts: Share text, images, videos, and polls with followers in your timeline.
Chat functionality: Send direct messages and participate in group chats with other users.
Content warnings: Add content warnings to posts for sensitive material with collapsible previews.
Emoji reactions: React to posts with custom emoji beyond standard likes and favorites.
Moderation tools: Manage your instance with user blocking, reporting, and content filtering.
Multiple frontends: Choose from various web interfaces including Pleroma-FE, Mastodon-FE, and others.
Media proxy: Proxy external media through your server for privacy and caching benefits.
Custom emoji: Upload and use custom emoji unique to your instance for community identity.
API compatibility: Support for Mastodon API enables use of third-party mobile apps and clients.
